data.text:
@nzherald What a joke of an article. Honestly this was New Zealand’s largest super spreader event ever. Bring it on anti vaccine people. Good luck in ICU. 
(Selfish)
@Mimicra07797108 @nzherald How many of them hospitalised? I would bet on zero. The @nzherald are good at non-stories.
@nzherald Any nurses ..??? We need a few here.

@fimason38 @SarenMum @nzherald And for replying to his question, in what I consider to be reasonably polite terms, pointing out that any 'one size fits all' perspective is inherently flawed, he blocks me. 

What an absolute chomper.
@nzherald @Ganeshan In fact, they’re all probably positive. It’s just they’re not testing.
@sobri And, you can take your unrelated statistics and shove them where the sun don't shine. I'm vaxxed. Your ignorance is disturbing.

@SarenMum Ok, so you’re a looney tunes anti vaxxer, ignoring real science and believing made up stuff. Stop wasting people’s time by engaging them with your nonsense. And stay away from them, for their safety. Goodbye.
